mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO boardNo, A.CATEGORY_ID categoryId, A.MEMBER_NO memberNo, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, A.CREATED_DATE createdDate, A.MODIFIED_DATE modifiedDate, A.VIEW_COUNT viewCount, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_NAME memberName, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AUTH_RECOMMEND R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO )AS likeCount FROM TB_AUTH_BOARD A JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY A.CREATED_DATE DESC OFFSET #{startIndex} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AUTH_BOARD WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N'

SELECT A.BOARD_NO boardNo, A.CATEGORY_ID categoryId, A.MEMBER_NO memberNo, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.BOARD_CONTENT boardContent, A.CREATED_DATE createdDate, A.MODIFIED_DATE modifiedDate, A.VIEW_COUNT viewCount, MEMBER_ID memberId, MEMBER_NAME memberName, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AUTH_RECOMMEND R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO )AS likeCount FROM TB_AUTH_BOARD A JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO = A.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND A.IS_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_AUTH_BOARD ( MEMBER_NO, CATEGORY_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{memberNo}, #{categoryId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo FROM TB_AUTH_BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AUTH_BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{boardContent}, MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
UPDATE TB_AUTH_BOARD SET IS_DELETED ='Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
